Perk.Name: Perk 1
Perk.Description: After the destruction of the wall, with probability of 2%, player gets a red booster

Perk.Name: Perk 2
Perk.Description: After the destruction of the wall, with probability of 2%, player gets a blue booster on 5 seconds

Perk.Name: Perk 3
Perk.Description: After the destruction of the wall, with probability of 2%, player gets a purple booster on 5 seconds

Perk.Name: Perk 5
Perk.Description: The bonus wall lasts for 2 seconds longer

Perk.Name: Perk 6
Perk.Description: For breaking his record in a free game more than one and a half times, the player receives an additional 300 coins

Perk.Description: Every 50 seconds a player gets a green booster for 10 seconds

Perk.Name: Perk 8
Perk.Description: When receiving a booster, the player also gets 10 coins

Perk.Name: Perk 9
Perk.Description: Number of coins collected per session starts to affect the amount points per session in free mode

Perk.Name: Perk 10
Perk.Description: After losing, an additional 1000 points are added to the final score

Perk.Name: Perk 11
Perk.Description: A black booster appears in the game

Perk.Name: Perk 12

Perk.Name: Perk 13

Perk.Name: Perk 14
Perk.Description: A rainbow booster appears in the game

Perk.Name: Perk 15
Perk.Description: After the destruction of the bonus wall, the player receives a random booster

Perk.Name: Perk 16
Perk.Description: Points are earned one and a half times faster

Perk.Name: Perk 17
Perk.Description: Every 15 seconds a player receives a red booster

Perk.Name: Perk 18
